mapper.insert: insert into tbl_activity( id, owner, name, startDate, endDate, cost, description, createTime, createBy ) values( #{id}, #{owner}, #{name}, #{startDate}, #{endDate}, #{cost}, #{description}, #{createTime}, #{createBy} )
mapper.select: select id, owner, name, startDate, endDate from tbl_activity where name like '%' #{aname} '%' and id not in( select ActivityId from tbl_clue_activity_relation where clueId=#{clueId} )
select id, owner, name, startDate, endDate from tbl_activity where name like '%' #{aname} '%'
